ossj.qos.util
Class LogStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          java.io.PrintStream
              ossj.qos.util.LogStream
public class LogStream
extends java.io.PrintStream

Title: JSR090 Reference Implementation Description: Captures standard output in a log file. It copies into the log file characters printed to standard output and standard error. Log is started by calling start() and stoped by calling stop(). Copyright: Copyright 2001 Ericsson Radio Systems AB Company: Ericsson

Version:
0.2
Author:
Henrik Lindstrom
